content: --मात्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} great in measure. very great or large. {2} most excellent, best. (--त्रः {1} a great officer of state, high state-official, a chief minister; (मंत्रे कर्मणि भूषायां वित्ते माने परिच्छदे . मात्रा च महती येषां महामात्रास्तु ते स्मृताः ..); <ls>Ms. 9. 259.</ls> {2} an elephant-driver or keeper; <ls>Pt. 1. 161.</ls> {3} a superintendent of elephants. (--त्री {1} the wife of a chief minister. {2} the wife of a chief minister. {3} the wife of a spiritual teacher.
